lines.i: The Procedure Implants section records any materials placed during the procedure including stents, tubes, and drains.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8178, CONF:10444 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.40"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15373)/@code="59771-6" Procedure Implants (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15374)
The Implants section SHALL include a statement providing details of the implants placed, or assert no implants were placed (CONF:8769)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15373)/@code="59771-6" Procedure Implants (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15374)
The Implants section SHALL include a statement providing details of the implants placed, or assert no implants were placed (CONF:8769)
